text: Lɨhavɨci 20.23 Mt 25.34, HJL 12.2, Lom 8.17, 2 Ko 1.7, CHL 1.9 Jisasɨ nulɨdɨ nameŋ abami. Viaŋ avɨha avɨha igɨben hameŋ namɨlaŋ avi avɨha avɨha igɨbalaŋ uami. Agadɨ ala iadɨ human sɨmi kɨlikɨli sakalɨ kɨlikɨli mɨgahɨnihɨni saŋ lɨbɨmɨŋamɨŋa sibɨla nɨbu iadɨ hɨma uami. Iadɨ Iavaŋ Asɨ nukeŋ hulaŋ hɨtɨŋ hɨtɨŋ agɨlaŋ iadɨ human sɨmi kɨlikɨli mɨgahɨnihɨni saŋ ci lɨbɨmɨŋalɨ uami. Sakalɨ kɨlikɨli mɨgahɨnihɨni saŋ avi ci lɨbɨmɨŋalɨ uami.
